source.300b57c2: ## How many medals did Kaggle Grandmasters get?

source.3461bcc6:
* We can see that about a quarter of Kaggle Grand Masters live in United States.
* In Europe, Russia and United Kingdom stand out.
* In Asia, many Grandmasters live in China, Japan, and India.
source.abda5405: ## Who will be the Next Notebooks Grandmaster?

* We know that there are many people from diffrent countries on Kaggle.
* Here We'd like to summarize the number of Master/Grandmaster by country.
source.fe68a60f: # Grandmaster * Only a very limited number of Kagglers can become a Grandmaster. | The type of Grandmaster | Requirement | | --- | --- | | Competitons Grandmaster | 5 Gold Medals and Solo Gold| | Datasets Grandmaster | 5 Gold Medals and 5 Silver Medals| | Notebooks Grandmaster | 15 Gold Medals| | Discussion Grandmaster| 50 Gold Medals and Total 500 Medals| > * "Solo Gold" means the gold medal won by yourself only. * In other words, to get a solo gold, you shouldn't merge a team.
source.61ed9081: EDA: Kaggle Master and Grandmaster
source.1965e33b:
* To become a Discussion Grandmaster, it is required to get 50 gold medals (And get 500 medals in total)
* Therefore, we introduce some Kaggle Discussion Masters who got more than 40 gold medals.
* The order is based on [Kaggle Rankings](https://www.kaggle.com/rankings?group=discussion).
* On 26th January, [Yirun Zhang](https://www.kaggle.com/gogo827jz) became a Discussion Grandmaster, Congratulations!

source.969329e7: ## Who will be the Next Competions Grandmaster? * To become a competitions GM, it is required to get five gold medals (including solo gold) * Therefore, we introduce some Kaggle Competitions Masters who more than four gold medals (include solo gold). * The order is based on the [Kaggle Rankings](https://www.kaggle.com/rankings?group=competitions).

source.8ac28410: ## Who will be the Next Discussion Grandmaster?
source.89979032: Do you know Kaggle Tiers?
source.d8684265: ## How many Masters/Grandmasters does Kaggle have?
source.40201d2b:
* To get a Competition medal, you need to get good results in the competition.


| | 0-99 teams | 100-249 teams | 250-999 teams| 1000+ teams |
|--- | --- | --- | --- | --- | 
|Bronze|  Top 40% | Top 40%| Top 100| Top 10%
|Silver| Top 20% | Top 20%| Top 50 | Top 5%|
|Gold| Top 10% | Top 10| Top 10 + 0.2% | Top 10 + 0,2% | 


> 
* As you can see from the table above, getting a medal in competiton is not easy.
* Only a very talented Kagglers can get a gold medal.
source.53d0403d: * Many Grandmasters started Kaggle journey more than five years ago, but some have become Grandmaster in a year or two.
source.b459da1e: EDA: Masters and Grandmasters
source.8e11ef9d:
* Unlike Novice and Contributer, you have to get medals to become an Expert.

| The type of Expert | Requirement |
| --- | --- |
|  Competitons Expert | 2 Bronze Medals|
| Datasets Expert | 3 Bronze Medals|
| Notebooks Expert | 5 Bronze Medals|
| Discussion Expert| 50 Bronze Medals

> 
* I will explain how to get a medal later.
source.096585bf: ![](https://www.kaggle.com/static/images/tier-animation-transparent.gif) * [Image Source](https://www.kaggle.com/progression) * On Kaggle, there are 5 tiers such as Novice,Contibutor,Expert,Master,and Grandmaster.

source.d66e8443: * To get medals in Datasets/Notebook/Discussion, you need to upload public datasets/notebooks or post a comment and get upvotes from other Kagglers.
source.dd6d5c0b:
* To be a Datasets Grandmaster, it is required to get 5 gold and silver medals.
* Therefore, we introduce some Kaggle Datasets Masters who got more than　7 (gold+silver) medals or got more than 5 gold medals.
* The order is based on [Kaggle Rankings](https://www.kaggle.com/rankings?group=datasets).
source.e9b49ad3: ## Who will be the Next Datasets Grandmaster?
source.df04a1d3:
|Datasets/Notebooks Medals | Requirement |
|--- | --- |
|Bronze|  5 Votes | 
|Silver| 20 Votes | 
|Gold| 50 Votes|

|Discussion Medals | Requirement |
|--- | --- |
|Bronze|  1 Vote | 
|Silver| 5 Votes | 
|Gold| 10 Votes|

> 
* Not all upvote count towards medals: **votes by Novices and votes on old posts and self-votes are excluded from medal calculation.** (Quoted from [here](https://www.kaggle.com/progression))

* The difinition of **"old"** is not announced, but in my experience, posts about a month or two ago do not seem to be considered **"old"**. (If anyone knows, please let me know.)
source.2b9f91b9: * Here goes the main part. * Based on the Meta Kaggle datasets, we analyze the data about Kaggle Masters and Grandmasters.
source.94519b06:
* To become a contributer, you have to meet some conditions below.
> * Add a bio to your profile
> * Add your location
> * Add your occupation
> * Add your organization
> * SMS verify your account
> * Run 1 script
> * Make 1 competition or task submission
> * Make 1 comment
> * Cast 1 upvote

* These conditions are very easy, so I think that Novices should become Contributor ASAP!
source.bc8becec:
* Most of Grandmaster got 5 to 10 gold medals.
* What's amazing is that there are two Grandmasters who have won more than 30 gold medals.
* The Grandmaster who got the most gold medals in competitions is ["Giba"](https://www.kaggle.com/titericz) (55 Gold Medals)
source.d37f0702: * Kaggle Grandmasters are good at getting medals, so we observe the data about the number of medals they got.
source.ccc7f3c2:
* Kaggle was created in 2010, and more and more poeple registered year by year.
* In general, it is said that the more time you spend, the better your skills will be, but some people do very well in short a short time.
* We observe how long Kaggle Grandmasters enjoy Kaggle here.

source.dc4171fd:
* When you just registered Kaggle, you were difinitely Novice.
* Novices can not downvote other's comment or topics, and their upvote doesn't count towards medals.
source.62e81d40:
* We can see that there are a large number of Kagglers who became a Master/Grandmaster in Competitions.
* The number of Datasets Master/Grandmaster is not included the data, so we got the number from [Kaggle Rankings](https://www.kaggle.com/rankings?group=datasets&page=1&pageSize=20).
source.2164bbd6:
* Unfortunately, **"Meta Kaggle"** datasets doesn't have the information about countries kagglers live in.
* Therefore, we have to the information by hand (Webscraping is also useful, but I couldn't).
* We observe the data about Grandmaster only here, because it takes a lot of time to make datasets about Master (About 1600 people).
* Datasets about Kaggle Grandmaster can be accessed [here](https://www.kaggle.com/japandata509/kaggle-grandmasters).

source.b34374e9:
* To become a Notebooks Grandmaster, it is required to get 15 gold medals, so  most of Grandmasters got 15 to 20 gold medals.
* The Grandmaster who got the most gold medals in notebooks is ["Chris Deotte"](https://www.kaggle.com/cdeotte) (45 Gold Medals)
source.c494b995: ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/7c/Kaggle_logo.png) # About this Notebook * In this notebook, we analyze the Kaggle Metadata and introduce some kagglers who are likely to become a Grandmaster. * If you like, please feel free to upvote! * For writing this notebook, I referred [this great notebook](https://www.kaggle.com/raenish/become-grandmaster).
source.d2d7a2df:
* To become a Notebooks Grandmaster, it is required to get 15 gold medals.
* Therefore, we introduce some Kaggle Notebooks Masters who got more than 10 gold medals.
* The order is based on [Kaggle Rankings](https://www.kaggle.com/rankings?group=notebooks)
source.ba21b3b0:
* Whether Competition Master or other Masters, becoming a Master is very difficult.
> 

| The type of Master | Requirement |
| --- | --- |
|  Competitons Master | 1 Gold Medal and 2 Silver Medals|
| Datasets Master | 1 Gold Medal and 4 Silver Medals|
| Notebooks Master | 10 Silver Medals|
| Discussion Master| 50 Silver Medals and Total 200 Medals|
source.adc4734e: * As in the title, one of objectives of this notebook is introducing some kagglers who are likely to become a Grandmaster.
source.32275ab1:
* Naturally, it is very difficult to get a gold medal in discussion (10 Upvotes are required).
* Most of Grandmaster got 50 to 100 gold medals.
* The Grandmaster who got the most gold medals in discussion is ["CPMP"](https://www.kaggle.com/cpmpml) (322 Gold Medals)
source.c9176d65:
* To become Expert,Master,and Grandmaster, we have to get a medal.
* Then, how do we get a medal on Kaggle?
source.d110d95c:
* In this notebook, firstly we learned about Kaggle Tiers and how to get medals.
* Secondly, we observed the data about Kaggle Masters and Grandmasters.
* Finally, some Kaggle Masters who are likely to become a Grandmaster were introduced.

* What is surprising is that there are many Kagglers who are likely to become a GM.
* Masters and Grandmasters are outstanding Kagglers, so it is necessary to keep an eye on their works.
